statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT shelter_id, location FROM emergency_shelters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE location LIKE 'P%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shelters FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE available_resources LIKE '%medical%' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity, available_resources FROM emergency_shelters WHERE location = 'City Center' AND capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM emergency_shelters WHERE available_resources IS NULL OR available_resources = '' ORDER BY shelter_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS total_locations, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM emergency_shelters WHERE capacity > 0;
SELECT * FROM shelters;
SELECT shelter_id, location FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT contact_name, contact_number FROM shelter_contacts WHERE shelter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE available_resources LIKE '%food%';
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE available_resources LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY shelter_id ASC;
SELECT s.*, sc.contact_name, sc.contact_number FROM shelters s INNER JOIN shelter_contacts sc ON s.shelter_id = sc.shelter_id WHERE sc.contact_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY s.capacity DESC;
SELECT s.shelter_id, s.location, s.capacity, sc.contact_name FROM shelters s LEFT JOIN shelter_contacts sc ON s.shelter_id = sc.shelter_id WHERE sc.contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.shelter_id ASC;

SELECT s.shelter_id, s.location, sc.contact_name, sc.contact_number FROM shelters s LEFT JOIN shelter_contacts sc ON s.shelter_id = sc.shelter_id WHERE s.capacity <= 100 AND sc.contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.capacity DESC, sc.contact_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_locations;
SELECT location_name, address FROM emergency_locations WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT shelter_id, capacity, available_spaces FROM shelter_capacity ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM shelter_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Food' AND quantity > 100;
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM emergency_locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_locations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT location_name, address FROM emergency_locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT shelter_id, SUM(available_spaces) AS total_available_spaces FROM shelter_capacity GROUP BY shelter_id;

SELECT el.location_id, sr.resource_type, sr.quantity FROM emergency_locations AS el JOIN shelter_capacity AS sc ON el.location_id = sc.location_id JOIN shelter_resources AS sr ON sc.shelter_id = sr.shelter_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city FROM Locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT location_name, address, city FROM Locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM Capacities WHERE max_capacity > 50;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, address FROM Locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Locations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM Capacities WHERE max_capacity > 100;
SELECT location_name, address, city, state FROM Locations WHERE state = 'Texas';
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT contact_name, contact_number FROM shelter_contacts;
SELECT shelter_id, resource_name, quantity FROM resource_inventory;
SELECT * FROM shelter_occupancy WHERE total_occupants > 50;
SELECT status_id, status_code, status_description FROM shelter_status;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM emergency_shelters;
SELECT * FROM shelter_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, total_occupants, occupancy_date FROM shelter_occupancy WHERE total_occupants > 50;
SELECT s.location, ri.resource_name, ri.quantity FROM emergency_shelters s JOIN resource_inventory ri ON s.shelter_id = ri.shelter_id;
SELECT * FROM shelter_status WHERE status_code = 1 AND status_description IS NOT NULL;
